likelihood_impact_change.explanation: Under the Delayed Transition scenario, consumer preferences may shift more significantly towards sustainability and eco-friendly products due to the heightened awareness of climate issues. This could lead to an increased demand for greener technology, impacting the Mac Division positively, but also increasing competition in the market.

emerging_opportunities.description: Development of a new line of eco-friendly Mac computers that utilize sustainable materials and energy-efficient technologies.
Integration of software that promotes energy saving and efficiency for users, appealing to environmentally conscious consumers.

additional_challenges.description: Rising costs and disruptions in the supply chain due to climate change impacts and regulatory pressures may affect the availability of components.
Increased competition from other brands focusing on sustainability could lead to market share loss if Apple does not adapt quickly.

mitigation_strategies.description: Shift to renewable and recycled materials in Mac products to meet changing consumer preferences and regulatory standards.
Conduct extensive market research to better understand shifting consumer preferences towards sustainability and adjust marketing strategies accordingly.
Develop partnerships with suppliers committed to sustainable practices to ensure a stable supply chain amidst climate risks.
